title: Change site logo asset and update header/footer to use it

requirements.text: Replace the current site logo with a new logo image and ensure the header and footer display the updated logo correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: A new logo image exists under frontend/public/assets/generated and differs from the previous design.
Site header logo image renders the updated logo at the existing size (h-10 w-10) without distortion.
Site footer logo image renders the updated logo at the existing size (h-8 w-8) without distortion.
No other site functionality or routes are affected.

requirements.text: Update all frontend references that currently point to "/assets/generated/cafe-logo.dim_512x512.png" to use the new logo asset filename (while keeping existing alt text unless explicitly changed).
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of the old logo path are updated (including SiteHeader and SiteFooter).
The application builds and runs with no missing-asset errors (no broken image icons for the logo).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep static image assets served from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not route images through the backend).
nonGoals: Changing the site name text (e.g., "Village Cafe") or navigation labels.
Changing the hero banner image or overall site theme.

edits: Redesign the logo with a fresh, warm, friendly look suitable for a village internet cafe (cafe-logo.dim_512x512.png > cafe-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png)
